languages.text: {n}Солдат бледнеет с каждым вашим словом. Стоит вам закончить, как он падает на колени.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Человек напряженно вслушивается в каждое ваше слово. Вы замечаете, что из левого уха у него тянется след запекшейся крови.{/n} "Виноват, Ваш высокобродие, виноват! Тут поди разбери, кто есть кто..."

languages.text: {n}The soldier grows more and more pale with every word you say. As soon as you are done speaking, he falls to his knees.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Солдат бледнеет с каждым вашим словом. Стоит вам закончить, как он падает на колени.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}The soldier grows more and more pale with every word you say. As soon as you are done speaking, he falls to his knees.{/n}

{n}The soldier grows more and more pale with every word you say. As soon as you are done speaking, he falls to his knees.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Der Soldat wird mit jedem deiner Worte immer blasser. Als du ausgesprochen hast, fällt er auf die Knie.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The soldier grows more and more pale with every word you say. As soon as you are done speaking, he falls to his knees.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Der Soldat wird mit jedem deiner Worte immer blasser. Als du ausgesprochen hast, fällt er auf die Knie.{/n}

languages.text: {n}À chacune de vos paroles, le soldat blêmit de plus en plus. Dès que vous avez fini de parler, il tombe à genoux.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The soldier grows more and more pale with every word you say. As soon as you are done speaking, he falls to his knees.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}À chacune de vos paroles, le soldat blêmit de plus en plus. Dès que vous avez fini de parler, il tombe à genoux.{/n}

languages.text: {n}你每说一个字，这个士兵的脸色就苍白一分。你刚说完话，他就猛地跪在了地上。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The soldier grows more and more pale with every word you say. As soon as you are done speaking, he falls to his knees.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}你每说一个字，这个士兵的脸色就苍白一分。你刚说完话，他就猛地跪在了地上。{/n}

languages.text: {n}こちらが口を開くほど、兵士は青ざめていく。話し終わるとすぐに、男は膝をついた。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The soldier grows more and more pale with every word you say. As soon as you are done speaking, he falls to his knees.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}こちらが口を開くほど、兵士は青ざめていく。話し終わるとすぐに、男は膝をついた。{/n}

languages.text: {n}El soldado palidece más y más con cada palabra que dices. En cuanto acabas de hablar, cae de rodillas.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The soldier grows more and more pale with every word you say. As soon as you are done speaking, he falls to his knees.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}El soldado palidece más y más con cada palabra que dices. En cuanto acabas de hablar, cae de rodillas.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Ağzından çıkan her kelimeyle askerin rengi daha da soluyor. Konuşman biter bitmez dizlerinin üzerine çöküyor.{/n}
